casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harry James FOWLER. No. 584P99-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of July 2008 by Defendant for Constitutional Question N.C.G.S. Sec. 132-1 to 132-9:

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
